lead_paragraph: Barcelona battled back from a goal down and scored twice in the second half to overcome hosts Borussia Moenchengladbach 2-1 in their Champions League Group C match on Wednesday despite the absence of the injured Lionel Messi.

headline.print_headline: Barcelona Battle From Goal Down to Beat Gladbach 2-1
headline.main: Barcelona Battle From Goal Down to Beat Gladbach 2-1

snippet: Barcelona battled back from a goal down and scored twice in the second half to overcome hosts Borussia Moenchengladbach 2-1 in their Champions League Group C match on Wednesday despite the absence of the injured Lionel Messi....
